posts.post_content:
Posted By: Corey
I'm always looking for T206 beaters (the worst condition, the better...I'm a poor student looking to keep my collection going)

So if you have anything, let me know. Thanks to summer time, I can actually work and have money for cards. I have about 130 in my set thus far so still a lot of beaters needed!

I am also specifically looking for, but not limited to since I need about 250 cards still:

Sherry Magee portrait (found, thank you)

Mathewson portrait (found, thank you)

Cobb bat on or off

Evers portrait(found, thank you)

Any Cy Young

Any Pittsburgh player

Thanks in advance!

Posted By: Mike
Mail sent, Corey

Posted By: Corey
Thanks to everyone who emailed. I'm still looking for beaters. Any condition at all...please email me if you have any for sale.
